ygData.subject: Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh, you have to be in a group..that was the link that I was missing.  So if I am in a group, does the whole group have to be speaking that language?  Or can I
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh, you have to be in a group..that was the link that I was missing. So if
I am in a group, does the whole group have to be speaking that language? Or
can I just be speaking gibberish to them? Can you use a pre set up /say
macro on one of your hot buttons?

Thanks for the info.

Grod
Paladin of the 14th Level
Innoruuk Server

-----Original Message-----
From: McConnell, Jeff [mailto:Jeff.McConnell@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 7:41 AM
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: New Topic, Languages!!!


From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>

You need to be in a group and right click on the chat window and switch to
the language and it will go up with time.
Silvermyst
